sentences.en: Abstract: Urban biodiversity is related to urban sustainable development.
sentences.cn: 提要城市生物多样性事关城市可持续发展.

sentences.en: Aves diversity is one of the most important components of the biodiversity.
sentences.cn: 鸟类多样性是生物多样性的重要组成部分.

sentences.en: Biodiversity includes genetic Biodiversity , species diversity and ecosystem and landscape Biodiversity.
sentences.cn: 生物多样性包括遗传 、 物种、生态系统与景观多样性.

sentences.en: Biodiversity was the buzzword of the Rio Earth Summit.
sentences.cn: 生物多样性是里约热内卢地球峰会上的时髦词儿。

sentences.en: Butterflies are indicators of the biodiversity of our natural environment.
sentences.cn: 蝴蝶是自然环境中生物多样性的重要指标.

sentences.en: Great progress has been made in protection of biodiversity.
sentences.cn: 生物多样性保护取得重大进展.

sentences.en: In other words , the tropics do , indeed, act as cradles of biodiversity.
sentences.cn: 换句话说, 热带地区确实起着生物多样性之源的作用.

sentences.en: Investment in biodiversity data management ( BDM ) can only meet 20 % ～30 % requirement.
sentences.cn: 在资金资源方面,满足程度仅为20%～30%.

sentences.en: Is this factor responsible for the greater part of biodiversity?
sentences.cn: 这一因素是造成生物多样性的较大部分的原因 吗 ?

sentences.en: The area also represents a significant habitat for biodiversity conservation.
sentences.cn: 这个地方还是生物多样性保护区.

sentences.en: The biodiversity and the threats from exotic, invasive species.
sentences.cn: 生物品种和来自外来的 、 侵略性物种的威胁.
热带雨林中的生物多样性

sentences.en: The goal is to protect biodiversity, to provide stability and resilience.
sentences.cn: 我们的目标就是保护生物多样性, 提供稳定和恢复的能力.

sentences.en: Their commitment was only to maintain the extent of forests, not their biodiversity.
sentences.cn: 他们仅承诺维持现有森林面积，并不保证林区生物的多样性。

sentences.en: This implies that the total biodiversity of the Weddell Sea is enormous.
sentences.cn: 这意味着,威德尔海的生物多样性在总体上来说是异常丰富的.

sentences.en: We are on the verge of a major biodiversity crisis.
sentences.cn: 我们正处于严重的生物多样性危机的边缘.

words.tran_cn: 生物所能分解的，能进行生物降解的

trans.tran_cn: 生物多类状态，生物多样性
trans.tran_en: the variety of plants and animals in a particular place
